name: The Action Star
description:
Wanna be an action star?

Always stay at camera view for you to become a star!

This game is made in 2-3 days for Weekly Game Jam 135. This is my first game. Have fun!

Music used from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/ royalty free musics.

Soundfx used from http://soundbible.com/  sfx by Mike Koenig

CONTROLS

A / Left Arrow Key To Punch Left.

D / Right Arrow Key To Punch Right.
